Text:
Much appreciated. I saw The Thing at the age of seven, and it led it a life-long love for horror. After the nightmares, it seeded some life-long obsessions. :)

Anyhow, hanks for all you do.
you're welcome. i don't think i've ever seen the thing. i will have to watch it soon. maybe this weekend -- when my wife goes to see that freakin' oz movie, lol
I've now been told I'm going to Oz, my wife saying I'll love it. Hopefully the 3D will make the experience fruitful. fingers crossed. They should do a cross-over, The Thing goes to Oz.
